channel.title: Happy Maybe
channel.description: Happy Maybe is a conversational podcast where Vasily and Nikita share their unique insights on the winding journey of life. From cultural adaptation to navigating life's obstacles, they explore existential issues and the complex nature of happiness.
channel.itunes:summary: Happy Maybe is a conversational podcast where Vasily and Nikita share their unique insights on the winding journey of life. From cultural adaptation to navigating life's obstacles, they explore existential issues and the complex nature of happiness.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Two friends discuss existential issues of life, free will, and overcoming obstacles, sometimes getting lost in questions and solutions.
channel.itunes:author: Vasily Myazin and Nikita Chepanov

item.title: Less-Than-Ideal Choices
item.itunes:subtitle: Vasily and Nikita explore the complexities of making tough choices in a world of competing perspectives in the debut episode.
item.description:
In the debut episode of Happy Maybe (which was still an unnamed podcast at the time of the recording), Vasily and Nikita dive into a nuanced conversation about the difficulties of taking sides when faced with two less-than-ideal options. From navigating personal relationships to grappling with divisive political issues, they explore the complexities of making tough choices.

Join them for a gripping conversation on how to find a way forward in a world of competing perspectives.

  • Peace Pilgrim (book) https://www.peacepilgrim.org/translations
